article.title: L-3 to Provide Flight Trainers
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications, Link Simulation and Training, Arlington, Texas, was awarded a $32,399,999 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of operational flight trainers, spare parts and contractor logistic support. Work will be performed in Arlington and Taiwan, with an estimated completion date of Dec. 24, 2016. The bid was solicited through the Internet, with one bid received. The U.S. Army Program Executive Office Simulation, Training & Instrumentation, Orlando, Fla., is the contracting activity.
